reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains complex concepts clearly. Her enthusiasm for physics is contagious!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor. Prof. Chang's projects are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Lectures can be dry, but Dr. Rodriguez is knowledgeable and always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Kim makes calculus understandable and even enjoyable. Best math professor I've had!

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and interesting assignments. Dr. Patel brings real-world examples into the classroom.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are monotonous, and Prof. Anderson seems disinterested in student questions.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's passion for chemistry is evident. Her labs are well-organized and informative.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Wright's analysis of classic literature is insightful. Assignments encourage critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting course material, but Dr. Garcia's grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson explains complex economic theories in an accessible way. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green's passion for environmental issues is inspiring. Field trips were a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Brown often goes off-topic and seems unprepared for lectures. Disappointing experience.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Martinez is always available to help students understand difficult concepts.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Lee presents balanced viewpoints but could improve on encouraging class discussions.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's lectures are like guided tours through art museums. Absolutely fascinating!

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Zhang's practical approach to engineering problems is refreshing. Good balance of theory and application.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen is knowledgeable, but her assignments can be unclear. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Carter's real-world experience in business adds tremendous value to the course. Excellent mentor.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Morris brings anthropology to life with her engaging storytelling and diverse case studies.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Ivanov seems more interested in his research than teaching. Lectures are often confusing.
